title: (x) compressed sans used in Feltron 2006 Annual Report - Opti Giant {Nicholas Felton (self)}
content:
found off of a website where the guy made an annual report about himself.

[http://www.feltron.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141012030447/http:/www.feltron.com/ "http://www.feltron.com/")

any ideas on the yellow typeface?
author: malmethod

comments.content: Wonderful piece, no? Almost [Titling Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20141012030447/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=7&displayfontid=FB.122844.0.0&fontRendererText=FELTRON+2006+ANNUAL+REPORT). But why don't you ask Mr. Felton himself? He's a friendly guy.
Wow, that personal annual report is a beauty!
isnt it! my girlfriend sent me it, and i was floored. on his website he said contact him about a printed copy, i immediately did so, but no reply yet. :)

Allright - the definitive answer is that the typeface is Opti Giant.

It’s a part of the dubious Opti Collection that has been discussed in a few other threads in the forum.

Thanks for the interest.

Nicholas.

Damn Opti. Out of print, as it were.

Thanks, Nicholas!
